item.description:
Hey TMIRCE. We're going to join up with our friends from Community Running for some epic marathon cheering. Here are the details:

We will station up just past Mile 24, at the corner of Beacon St and St. Paul to cheer our fellow runners on.  Bring some Gu and other items for final-two-miles energy.  And as always, tequila and other bevs are welcome for those *really* in need.

TMIRCE Runners: We need BIB#, start time, projected pace, projected time at Mile 24, and what you'll be wearing (if you know) [so that we can find you!].

Click to fill out the spreadsheet so we can track you.

TMIRCE viewers and runners: Here is a map of where we will be.  It is the inbound corner of Beacon and St. Paul Streets, directly in front of Budda C restaurant (used to be Jae's Grill a few years ago).  There is always a DJ there so it's a really fun spot.

Runners: Look for the blue Chestnut Hill Realty sign and the black sign for Budda C restaurant.  We will be on your RIGHT as you coast through those final 2 miles!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in front of McDonalds

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE:BOS Marathon Watch Party
